https://github.com/satellite-image-deep-learning/datasets

https://zenodo.org/records/3765872#.YHs-MBMzbUI

```{r}
library(osmdata)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(prettymapr)
```

```{r}
great_lakes_bbox <- c(-93.0, 41.0, -74.0, 49.5) 

place <- "Lake Erie, United States"

building_query <- opq(place) |>
  add_osm_feature(key = "natural")

building_data <- osmdata_sf(building_query)
```

```{r}
buildings <- building_data$osm_polygons

ggplot() +
  ggspatial::annotation_map_tile(type = "cartolight", zoom = 8) +
  geom_sf(data = buildings, fill = "darkgreen", color = NA)

```
